metadata.synopsis: Player's AD feedback about not able to go through a SMALL teleporter hole.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Don't have WEIGHT_SMALL tag on your character.Find a TeleporterHole which filters on WEIGHT_SMALL tag.Click it.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Not a chance I'll fit in there.

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Whatever secrets lie beyond this opening will be for someone smaller to discover.*
